item.description:
Everyone really enjoyed our first venture with The Contemporary Theater Company so we're going to take in their Cold War Comedy "Red Herring." Seating is general admission and is an absolute steal at $20. This performance is part of the Wakefield Arts and Entertainment Festival and is being performed under a tent outdoors.

The play is "Red Herring." Here is the description of the play:

Three love stories, a murder mystery and a nuclear espionage plot converge in this comedy about marriage and other explosive devices. It's 1952: America's on the verge of the H-bomb, Dwight Eisenhower's on the campaign trail, and I Love Lucy shows on Monday nights. Meanwhile, Senator Joe McCarthy's daughter just got engaged to a Soviet spy, and Boston detective Maggie Pelletier has to find out who dumped the dead guy in the Harbor - or else lose out on a honeymoon in Havana. A blunt-nosed, sharp-eyed look at love and tying (and untying, and retying) the knot.

Ticket Information

Tickets are $20. Seating is General Admission.

Each person is responsible for purchasing their own ticket. For reservations, please contact the theater. Their box office information is here: http://www.thecontemporarytheater.com/boxoffice/index.htm.

Please do not wait to order your tickets! I strongly recommend that you order your tickets now.

Meet-up Logistics

I will provide my cell number when you RSVP.  Meet at the entrance to the tent by 6:30.  Note that, since the seating is general admission, we will enter the tent as soon as the "doors" (flap?) open.  If you are running late, please contact me so we can hold a seat for you.

Directions (per the CTC website)

Directions from Providence and points north

  1. Take I-95 South to Route 4 South
  2. Take exit for downtown Wakefield
  3. Turn right at end of ramp onto Old Tower Hill Road
  4. Continue straight for 1.3 miles (Old Tower Hill Road becomes Main Street)
  5. Take a right onto High Street (Damon's Hardware will be on your left)
  6. The park is about 100 feet on your right. The entrance to Wakefield Elementary School parking lot is on the right just after the park.

Directions from Newport and points east

  1. Take Route 138 West
  2. Exit onto Route 138/Route 1 South toward Westerly/New York
  3. Continue south for about 7 miles
  4. Take exit for downtown Wakefield
  5. Turn right at end of ramp onto Old Tower Hill Road
  6. Continue straight for 1.3 miles (Old Tower Hill Road becomes Main Street)
  7. Take a right onto High Street (Damon's Hardware will be on your left)
  8. The park is about 100 feet on your right. The entrance to Wakefield Elementary School parking lot is on the right just after the park.

Directions from Westerly and points south

  1. Take Route 1 North
  2. Take exit for downtown Wakefield
  3. Turn left at end of ramp onto Old Tower Hill Road
  4. Continue straight for 1.3 miles (Old Tower Hill Road becomes Main Street)
  5. Take a right onto High Street (Damon's Hardware will be on your left)
  6. The park is about 100 feet on your right. The entrance to Wakefield Elementary School parking lot is on the right just after the park.
item.how_to_find_us: At the entrance to the tent
item.name: Red Herring
